description: Newly promoted Premier League side Burnley are close to agreeing a permanent deal to sign free agent Andros Townsend, BBC Sport understands.
title: Andros Townsend: Burnley close to agreeing deal with winger
title_page: Andros Townsend: Burnley close to agreeing deal with winger - BBC Sport
maintext: Our coverage of Burnley is bigger and better than ever before - here's everything you need to know to make sure you never miss a moment
